subject: LEED certification documentation due
body: Final LEED certification documents must be submitted by November 20th. Please compile all material data sheets and energy performance reports.

subject: Solar panel installation complete - ready for inspection
body: Rooftop solar panel array installation complete. Electrical connection ready. Requesting utility inspection before grid connection.

subject: Eco-friendly flooring delayed - alternative material available
body: Specified bamboo flooring unavailable until January. We can substitute with FSC-certified hardwood at similar cost. Approval needed ASAP.

subject: High-efficiency HVAC system commissioning
body: Geothermal HVAC system ready for final commissioning. Testing scheduled for next week. System exceeds energy efficiency targets by 15%.

subject: Rainwater collection system coordination required
body: Need coordination meeting between plumbing, structural, and landscape trades for integrated rainwater collection system installation.

subject: Client walkthrough scheduled - sustainability features
body: Client wants to see completed sustainability features including green roof, solar panels, and efficient lighting. Walkthrough scheduled for Friday at 2 PM.
